source.sqlReaderQuery: select modifieddate as highwatermarkdate from highwatermark

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate >'@{activity('Get Highwatermark date').output.firstRow.highwatermarkdate}'
and modifieddate <='@{activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.lastmodifiedadate}'

update highwatermark set modifieddate='@{activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.lastmodifiedadate }' where tablename='customer';
Select 'Uday';
@if(equals(item(),'product'),'select * from saleslt.product where productid>100','select * from saleslt.customer where Customerid>100 and Customerid <1000')

source.sqlReaderQuery: select FirstName + ' ' + coalesce(MiddleName,'') + ' '+ lastName as Customer_Name, Addresstype from saleslt.customer join saleslt.customeraddress on saleslt.customer.customerid=saleslt.customeraddress.customerid
Select max(modifieddate) as lastmodifieddate from saleslt.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate >='@{activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.prop_0}' and modifieddate<='@{activity('Lookup2').output.firstRow.lastmodifieddate}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: Select count(*) as recordcount from saleslt.customer
select count(*) as recordcount from saleslt.product
select max(modifieddate) as lastmodifieddate from saleslt.customer

select1 split(indicator=='Daily hospital occupancy' || indicator=='Daily ICU occupancy',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
